          <title>
            <string language="en">Holocaust Remembrance Day</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Holocaust Erinnerung-Tag</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Holocauste jour de Souvenir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dia De Holocaust Remembrance</string>

          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A comprehensive online Unit which teaches about the Holocaust, includes history, testimonials , movies and various activities.</string>

verschiedene Aktivitäten ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une unité en ligne complète qui enseigne au 
sujet du Holocauste, inclut l'histoire, les testimonials, les films et
les diverses activités.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma unidade em linha detalhada que ensine sobre o

δραστηριότητες.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Una unidad en línea comprensiva que enseña sobre
el Holocaust, incluye historia, testimonials, películas y varias
